segments.text: Why ? You're not working so don't you have a lot of time on your hands ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have so much house work to do . I have to take care of the kids , cook , clean , laundry , and the cycle never ends .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about your husband . Does he help much ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . He comes home and complains about his hard day at work . He expects me to do everything . He even wants me to feed him sometimes . Can you believe that ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If he wasn't so lazy , I think I wouldn't have any complaints . He mows the lawn , but can you believe he tried to convince me to do it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh well . I'll have to live with it . What else can I do ?
segments.speaker: S2
